messages.message: Is there any plans to add image version numbers within a section of instabase? We have found that we patch instances within the same 22.xx however when we go to deploy a similar one in a sandbox from Jenkins and we experience unique issues that aren't in a patched version. Any easy way for sale engineers to know what modifications have been done to ib.com (http://ib.com) when we roll out new sandboxes on the same version or should Jenkins pipelines include all patches?
Yes this is being worked on
We hope to test it in 22.06 and roll it out in 22.07
